sn47.8:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, balo abyatto akusalo sudo rajanam va rajamahamattam va nanaccayehi supehi paccupatthito assa—
sn47.8:1.2: ambilaggehipi, tittakaggehipi, katukaggehipi, madhuraggehipi, kharikehipi, akharikehipi, lonikehipi, alonikehipi.
sn47.8:2.1: Sa kho so, bhikkhave, balo abyatto akusalo sudo sakassa bhattu nimittam na ugganhati:
sn47.8:2.2: ‘idam va me ajja bhattu supeyyam ruccati, imassa va abhiharati, imassa va bahum ganhati, imassa va vannam bhasati.
sn47.8:2.3: Ambilaggam va me ajja bhattu supeyyam ruccati, ambilaggassa va abhiharati, ambilaggassa va bahum ganhati, ambilaggassa va vannam bhasati. Tittakaggam va me ajja … katukaggam va me ajja … madhuraggam va me ajja … kharikam va me ajja … akharikam va me ajja … lonikam va me ajja … alonikam va me ajja bhattu supeyyam ruccati, alonikassa va abhiharati, alonikassa va bahum ganhati, alonikassa va vannam bhasati’ti.
sn47.8:3.1: Sa kho so, bhikkhave, balo abyatto akusalo sudo na ceva labhi hoti acchadanassa, na labhi vetanassa, na labhi abhiharanam.
sn47.8:3.3: Tatha hi so, bhikkhave, balo abyatto akusalo sudo sakassa bhattu nimittam na ugganhati.
sn47.8:3.4: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco balo abyatto akusalo bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.8:3.5: Tassa kaye kayanupassino viharato cittam na samadhiyati, upakkilesa na pahiyanti.
sn47.8:3.9: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.8:3.10: Tassa dhammesu dhammanupassino viharato cittam na samadhiyati, upakkilesa na pahiyanti.
sn47.8:4.1: Sa kho so, bhikkhave, balo abyatto akusalo bhikkhu na ceva labhi hoti dittheva dhamme sukhaviharanam, na labhi satisampajannassa.
sn47.8:4.3: Tatha hi so, bhikkhave, balo abyatto akusalo bhikkhu sakassa cittassa nimittam na ugganhati.
sn47.8:5.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, pandito byatto kusalo sudo rajanam va rajamahamattam va nanaccayehi supehi paccupatthito assa—
sn47.8:5.2: ambilaggehipi, tittakaggehipi, katukaggehipi, madhuraggehipi, kharikehipi, akharikehipi, lonikehipi, alonikehipi.
sn47.8:6.1: Sa kho so, bhikkhave, pandito byatto kusalo sudo sakassa bhattu nimittam ugganhati:
sn47.8:6.2: ‘idam va me ajja bhattu supeyyam ruccati, imassa va abhiharati, imassa va bahum ganhati, imassa va vannam bhasati.
sn47.8:6.3: Ambilaggam va me ajja bhattu supeyyam ruccati, ambilaggassa va abhiharati, ambilaggassa va bahum ganhati, ambilaggassa va vannam bhasati. Tittakaggam va me ajja … katukaggam va me ajja … madhuraggam va me ajja … kharikam va me ajja … akharikam va me ajja … lonikam va me ajja … alonikam va me ajja bhattu supeyyam ruccati, alonikassa va abhiharati, alonikassa va bahum ganhati, alonikassa va vannam bhasati’ti.
sn47.8:7.1: Sa kho so, bhikkhave, pandito byatto kusalo sudo labhi ceva hoti acchadanassa, labhi vetanassa, labhi abhiharanam.
sn47.8:7.3: Tatha hi so, bhikkhave, pandito byatto kusalo sudo sakassa bhattu nimittam ugganhati.
sn47.8:7.4: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco pandito byatto kusalo bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.8:7.5: Tassa kaye kayanupassino viharato cittam samadhiyati, upakkilesa pahiyanti.
sn47.8:7.9: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.8:7.10: Tassa dhammesu dhammanupassino viharato cittam samadhiyati, upakkilesa pahiyanti.
sn47.8:8.1: Sa kho so, bhikkhave, pandito byatto kusalo bhikkhu labhi ceva hoti dittheva dhamme sukhaviharanam, labhi hoti satisampajannassa.
sn47.8:8.3: Tatha hi so, bhikkhave, pandito byatto kusalo bhikkhu sakassa cittassa nimittam ugganhati”ti.
